item.title: [Tenderduty] Support Valcons Address for ICS Chains
item.description:
Feature Description

Added support for referencing Interchain Security (ICS) validators using their valcons address. This is critical for correctly monitoring consumer chains where validators might share the same consensus key but have different operator addresses.
